Goal Representation: ['1. Locate the faucet in the dining room.', '2. Fill a cup with water from the faucet.']

behavior locate_faucet(faucet:item, dining_room:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(faucet, dining_room)
        # Ensure the faucet is inside the dining room for identification

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind dining_room: item where:
            is_dining_room(dining_room)
        # Select the dining room
        
        bind faucet: item where:
            is_faucet(faucet)
        # Select the faucet

        locate_faucet(faucet, dining_room)
        # Locate the faucet within the dining room
